title: If there is no data for series, it should display a friendly error message to remind the user
OB: When selecting a column without data in the chart preview, there is no friendly error message displayed.
EB: It should display a friendly error message when selecting a column without data in the chart preview.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a chart and set the data definition.
2. Select a column without any data.
3. Observe that no friendly error message is displayed.
